reasoning_steps: Step 1: Read the provided template to identify the earnings-release dates (row 3), events (row 4), and the fiscal-year guidance period (row 6) for each column, then identified the green input cells for each metric/row to be populated.

Step 2: For each earnings-release date, located the corresponding ADT earnings release on ADT Investor Relations (investor.adt.com) or ADT Newsroom and extracted the full-year guidance ranges for Total Revenue, Adjusted EBITDA, Adjusted EPS (when provided), and Free Cash Flow/Adjusted Free Cash Flow (used as the closest disclosed proxy for the template’s 'FCF before special items'). Matched each extracted range to the fiscal year shown in row 6 (e.g., 3Q 2024 release updates FY 2024 guidance).

Step 3: Entered only hardcoded numeric low/high values into the green cells and applied blue font to all inputs. Left blank where ADT did not provide the metric (e.g., EPS prior to FY2023 in the template; FCF before special items not disclosed as such—ADT disclosed Adjusted Free Cash Flow). Notable: FY2025 guidance was updated in 3Q 2025; FY2024 guidance was tightened in 3Q 2024; FY2023 guidance was materially revised in 3Q 2023 due to the commercial divestiture.
data_sources: ADT Investor Relations press releases (investor.adt.com) for 2025–2020 earnings releases and guidance tables
ADT Newsroom press releases (newsroom.adt.com) for certain historical releases (e.g., 2019/2020 preliminary outlook, 2021 3Q update)
ADT Investor Relations press release for 4Q 2018 / FY2019 outlook (investor.adt.com)
